title: The Art of First Impressions
description: Learn how to make a memorable first impression in the first 30 seconds of meeting someone new. Master body language, tone, and conversation openers.
instructorBio: Certified dating coach with 10+ years of experience in relationship psychology.

title: Conversation Mastery Workshop
description: Master the art of engaging conversation with techniques to keep the spark alive. Learn active listening, storytelling, and how to create emotional connections.
instructorBio: Communication expert and bestselling author of 'Connect & Captivate'.
